title: Casino visitors in the U.S. ordered by age group 2010
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Age of casino visitors, and Percentage of respondents in each Age of casino visitors on the y axis.
The Percentage of respondents is highest at Age of casino visitors Age 50-64 and lowest at Age of casino visitors Don't know / refused.
The highest Age of casino visitors Age 50-64 has 30.0 more Percentage of respondents than the lowest Age of casino visitors Don't know / refused.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Age of casino visitors in the x axis and Percentage of respondents in the y axis.
The Percentage of respondents is highest at Age of casino visitors Age 50-64 and lowest at Age of casino visitors Don't know / refused.
There is a difference of 30.0 between the maximum Age of casino visitors Age 50-64 and minimum Age of casino visitors Don't know / refused.

Age of casino visitors Age 50-64 is higher than any other Age of casino visitorss with value 33.0, followed by , and Age 35-49. Down to Age of casino visitors Don't know / refused with the lowest value 3.0.
The highest value 33.0 at Age 50-64 is almost 1.65 times larger than the average value 20.0.
The Percentage of respondents is 100.0 if we add up values of all Age of casino visitorss.
